mapper.insert: insert into admin (admin_id, admin_name, admin_pwd, admin_nick, admin_phone, admin_email, admin_birth, admin_cre_date, admin_info_agree) values(#{admin_id},#{admin_name},#{admin_pwd},#{admin_nick},#{admin_phone},#{admin_email},#{admin_birth},now(),#{admin_info_agree})
mapper.select: select * from admin where admin_id=#{admin_id} and admin_pwd=#{admin_pwd}
